login.title: Shaashadda Maamulaha
login.subtitle: Gal si aad u maamulto goobta dukaameedkaaga
login.copyright: Â© 2024 WeedGo. Dhammaan xuquuqaha waa la ilaaliyay.
login.securityWarning: Tani waa aag la ilaaliyay. Dhammaan isku dayada gelitaanka ayaa la kormeerayaa oo la diiwaangeliyaa. Isku dayada gelitaanka aan la oggolaan waa la soo sheegayaa.

verification.title: Xaqiiji Akoontaada
verification.subtitle: Waxaan iimaylkaaga u dirnay koodka xaqiijinta
verification.subtitleWithPhone: Waxaan iimaylkaaga iyo telefoonkaaga u dirnay koodka xaqiijinta

email.title: Xaqiijinta Iimaylka
email.verified: Iimaylka si guul leh ayaa loo xaqiijiyay!

phone.title: Xaqiijinta Telefoonka
phone.verified: Telefoonka si guul leh ayaa loo xaqiijiyay!

verification.allComplete: Dhammaan xaqiijinta waa dhammaatay! Dib ayaa loo hagayaa...

errors.invalidCredentials: Iimaylka ama erayga sirta ah oo aan sax ahayn
errors.loginFailed: Galitaanku waa fashilmay. Fadlan mar labaad isku day.
errors.sessionExpired: Fadhigaagu wuu dhamaaday. Fadlan mar labaad gal.
errors.verificationFailed: Koodka xaqiijinta oo aan sax ahayn
errors.resendFailed: Koodka mar labaad u diridu waa fashilmay
